about_the_game:
The central part of the burial site is a vast circular chamber held by thick marble columns. A densely decorated crypt occupies the middle of the room. Labyrinth-like corridors head in all directions from here, with countless statues and decorations, lined up on their walls. Smoke hangs from the top of the chamber, covering the rooms in a mysterious mist. The floor is covered with stumps of long-burned candles. One door leads to a semicircular hall, at the end of which stands a huge throne at the top of a staircase. The sides of the stairs are covered with hundreds of skeletons, and on the ancient throne sits a two-people-tall skeleton with a matching sword in its hand.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
